page.title: 14SURVEY 4 PETS HOBBIES PAPERS
page.content: people have pets 76% dogs,cats,fish in that order of popularity this costs between 10p and Â£7.50.per week.Mother looks after pets the most 62% children 19% father 8%.{HOBBIES.}favourite hobby is gardening 39% followed by sport 26% reading 26% sewing 9%.Hobbies are not expensive.Sailing and studying for a degree are.On average people watch T.V.14 hours per week.Most people go out once a week 75%.{DAILY NEWSPAPERS READ.}The Daily Mail 33%,The Sun 17%,Guardian 13%,Star 3%,Express 7%,Telegraph 10%,Times 3%, 13% do not read a newspaper.Most people belong to a library 70% on average they read 3 books a month.{ {HOLIDAYS.}98% go on holiday each year.66% go once a year.The remainder twice or more.Only 10% go to the same place each year.35% prefer hotels,30% prefer self catering.
